instruction: Generate the text for an email pitch for the following product:
input: Product: An app that provides real-time polling data
output:
Dear [Recipient],

I am writing to introduce you to an app that has the potential to revolutionize the way people access up-to-date polling data. Our app provides real-time polling data that is collected from a variety of sources and presented in a way that is easy to understand and digest. Our app also features a variety of interactive features that make it easy to manipulate data and compare results. 

This innovative product is perfect for those who need to stay informed on the latest political news and events. With our app, users can easily access real-time polling data from various sources and view the data in interactive graphs and charts. 

I am excited to share this product with you, and I welcome any questions or comments you may have. I look forward to hearing from you!

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
